name: metrics-generator
description: Lambda function to generate and export custom metrics.

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda-package.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:prod: npm run build:prod && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda-package.zip . && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run package && terraform init && terraform apply
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run package:prod && terraform init && terraform apply
scripts.plan: npm run build && terraform init && terraform plan
